description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，无产阶级革命家、军事家，中国人民解放军开国上将。曾任北京军区首任司令员、代总参谋长、全国政协副主席等职。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, a proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and a founding general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as the first commander of the Beijing Military Region, acting Chief of the General Staff, and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾划分的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，与杨成武、杨得志并称“三杨”。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, known as one of the 'Three Yangs' along with Yang Chengwu and Yang Dezhi.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事指挥机关。
description.en: The military command organ of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任总参谋长，在文化大革命初期被打倒。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as Chief of the General Staff and was purged in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，林彪事件后被撤职。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who was dismissed after the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Yang Chengwu.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army University

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期为培养军政干部而创办的学校。
description.en: A school established by the Communist Party of China during the Agrarian Revolutionary War to train military and political cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Agrarian Revolutionary War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派遣的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，杨成武、余立金、傅崇碧被指“阴谋夺权”而遭免职的政治事件。
description.en: A political incident during the Cultural Revolution where Yang Chengwu, Yu Lijin, and Fu Chongbi were accused of 'conspiring to seize power' and were dismissed from their posts.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾划分的军区之一。
description.en: One of the former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略性大转移。
description.en: The strategic retreat of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间晋察冀军区部队在河北涞源的黄土岭地区对日军的一场战斗，击毙了日军中将阿部规秀。
description.en: A battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War fought by the Jin-Cha-Ji Military Region forces against the Japanese army in the Huangtuling area of Laiyuan, Hebei, where Japanese Lieutenant General Abe Norihide was killed.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将，在黄土岭战斗中被八路军击毙。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Imperial Japanese Army who was killed in action by the Eighth Route Army at the Battle of Huangtuling.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间晋察冀野战军发起的一场战役。
description.en: A campaign launched by the Shanxi-Chahar-Hebei Field Army during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，国民革命军第三军军长，在清风店战役中被俘。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army and commander of the 3rd Corps of the National Revolutionary Army, captured in the Qingfengdian Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾被定为毛泽东的接班人，后在九一三事件中丧生。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, once designated as Mao Zedong's successor, who died in the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命前夕，时任总参谋长罗瑞卿遭到批判和免职的政治事件。
description.en: A political event on the eve of the Cultural Revolution in which the then Chief of the General Staff Luo Ruiqing was criticized and dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: The main founder and the first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在文化大革命期间被迫害致死。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，四人帮成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪等人乘机叛逃，飞机在蒙古坠毁身亡的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao and others attempted to flee by plane, which crashed in Mongolia, resulting in their deaths.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of the reform and opening-up policy.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，与杨成武、杨勇并称“三杨”。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, known as one of the 'Three Yangs' along with Yang Chengwu and Yang Yong.

description.zh-cn: 对中国人民解放军三位杨姓高级将领杨得志、杨勇、杨成武的合称。
description.en: A collective term for three senior generals of the People's Liberation Army with the surname Yang: Yang Dezhi, Yang Yong, and Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武之子，曾任中国人民解放军空军副司令员，中将军衔。
description.en: Son of Yang Chengwu, former deputy commander of the People's Liberation Army Air Force with the rank of lieutenant general.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 杨成武担任北京军区首任司令员，后由杨勇接任。
description.en: Yang Chengwu served as the first commander of the Beijing Military Region, succeeded by Yang Yong.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

position.en: Acting Chief of the General Staff

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿被打倒后代理总参谋长，后因杨余傅事件被免职，由黄永胜接任军委办事组组长。
description.en: Served as Acting Chief of the General Staff after Luo Ruiqing's downfall, and was later dismissed due to the Yang-Yu-Fu incident. Huang Yongsheng succeeded him as the head of the Military Commission's administrative group.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 聂荣臻曾誉杨成武为“模范团政治委员”。
description.en: Nie Rongzhen once praised Yang Chengwu as a 'model regimental political commissar'.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武率领作为先头团的红四团参与长征，参加了飞夺泸定桥等关键战斗。
description.en: Yang Chengwu led the Red 4th Regiment, an advance unit, during the Long March, participating in key battles such as the seizure of Luding Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武指挥了黄土岭战斗。
description.en: Yang Chengwu commanded the Battle of Huangtuling.

description.zh-cn: 在杨成武指挥的黄土岭战斗中，其所部击毙了日军中将阿部规秀。
description.en: During the Battle of Huangtuling commanded by Yang Chengwu, his troops killed Japanese Lieutenant General Abe Norihide.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武参与指挥了清风店战役。
description.en: Yang Chengwu participated in commanding the Qingfengdian Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在清风店战役中，杨成武的部队俘虏了国民党第三军军长罗历戎。
description.en: During the Qingfengdian Campaign, Yang Chengwu's forces captured Luo Lirong, commander of the KMT's 3rd Corps.

description.zh-cn: 林彪推荐杨成武出任总参第一副总参谋长、中央军委副秘书长。
description.en: Lin Biao recommended Yang Chengwu for the positions of First Deputy Chief of the General Staff and Deputy Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武在罗瑞卿被打倒的过程中，积极参与了对罗瑞卿的揭发和批判。
description.en: During Luo Ruiqing's downfall, Yang Chengwu actively participated in denouncing and criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 在“八·二五事件”中，毛泽东表明了对杨成武的支持，反对王尚荣、雷英夫等人对杨的批评。
description.en: During the 'August 25th Incident', Mao Zedong expressed his support for Yang Chengwu against criticism from individuals like Wang Shangrong and Lei Yingfu.

description.zh-cn: 在“八·二五事件”中，周恩来表明了对杨成武的支持。
description.en: During the 'August 25th Incident', Zhou Enlai expressed his support for Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 贺龙被指责为批评杨成武的“八·二五事件”的“幕后黑手”。
description.en: He Long was accused of being the 'backstage manipulator' of the 'August 25th Incident' that criticized Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 以杨成武为首的总参党委将副总参谋长张爱萍停职，并成立专案组审查其“罪行”。
description.en: The General Staff Party Committee, led by Yang Chengwu, suspended Deputy Chief of General Staff Zhang Aiping and set up a special task force to investigate his 'crimes'.

description.zh-cn: 据邱会作回忆，杨成武倒台的关键在于其倒向了江青，引起了林彪的不满。
description.en: According to Qiu Huizuo's memoirs, a key factor in Yang Chengwu's downfall was his alignment with Jiang Qing, which caused dissatisfaction from Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 据邱会作回忆，因杨成武倒向江青，林彪对其不满，这是杨成武在杨余傅事件中倒台的关键因素。
description.en: According to Qiu Huizuo's memoirs, Lin Biao was dissatisfied with Yang Chengwu for aligning with Jiang Qing, which was a key factor in Yang's downfall in the Yang-Yu-Fu incident.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武在“杨余傅事件”中被撤销职务并受到看管。
description.en: Yang Chengwu was dismissed from his posts and placed under custody during the 'Yang-Yu-Fu incident'.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中死亡后，毛泽东开始反思杨余傅事件，为杨成武的复出创造了条件。
description.en: After Lin Biao's death in the Lin Biao incident, Mao Zedong began to reconsider the Yang-Yu-Fu incident, paving the way for Yang Chengwu's political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 江青曾试图提拔复出后的杨成武担任总参谋长。
description.en: Jiang Qing attempted to promote the rehabilitated Yang Chengwu to the position of Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平认为杨成武立场摇摆，阻止了江青提拔其担任总参谋长的意图。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping believed Yang Chengwu was politically vacillating and blocked Jiang Qing's attempt to promote him to Chief of the General Staff.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央将杨余傅事件定为“冤案”，为杨成武彻底平反。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee designated the Yang-Yu-Fu incident as a 'wrongful case', completely exonerating Yang Chengwu.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武与杨得志、杨勇并称为中国人民解放军的“三杨”。
description.en: Yang Chengwu, along with Yang Dezhi and Yang Yong, were known as the 'Three Yangs' of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 杨成武与杨得志、杨勇并称为中国人民解放军的“三杨”。
description.en: Yang Chengwu, along with Yang Dezhi and Yang Yong, were known as the 'Three Yangs' of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 杨东明娶秦基伟之女为妻。
description.en: Yang Dongming married Qin Jiwei's daughter.
